food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm a good source of potassium
💪 You eat me to get energy

food.question: I am round and red, sometimes green. You can bite into me or make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 Doctors say one of me keeps them away.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Bugs Bunny eats me a lot

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I am made by a farm animal
🥛 I am good for your bones

food.question: I am small, green, and round. I grow in a pod and you can eat me as a vegetable. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a type of legume
🟢 I'm the same color as grass

food.question: I am sweet and cold. You can eat me in a cone or a cup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I can be many different flavors
🌞 People like to eat me when it is hot
👅 I can make your tongue cold

food.question: I am made from tomatoes. I am red and go well with pasta. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 You can put me on pizza
🧅 Onions are often cooked with me

food.question: I am yellow and made from corn. You can pop me in a machine to make a tasty snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can eat me at the movies
🔥 I need heat to turn into a snack

food.question: I am a fruit with fuzzy skin. I am green inside and have tiny black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have the same name as a bird from New Zealand
🥄 You can scoop me out with a spoon

food.question: I am a type of bread with a hole in the middle. I am boiled before I am baked. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I take a bath before going into the oven
😋 You can put cream cheese on me

bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. I can be red or black, and sometimes steal crumbs from your picnic. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I work together with my friends to carry things.

bug.question: I have wings and fly around flowers. I like to make honey. What am I?
I have spots on my back and I am red or yellow. Children think I am very lucky. What am I?
I float through the air with colorful wings. First, I was a caterpillar. What am I now?
I make a sticky web to catch my food. Some people are afraid of me. What am I?
I jump really high and I am green. I make a chirping sound. What am I?
I glow in the dark. You can see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I only come out when it is dark.

bug.question: I live in the ground and move the soil around. Sometimes birds eat me. What am I?
I can sting you and I live in a nest with my family. I am black and yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 😠 I get angry if you disturb my home.
🏡 My family lives in a paper home.

bug.question: I eat wood and live inside trees. Sometimes I can damage houses! What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I can make holes in your home.
🐜 I look similar to ants but I eat wood.
